name: Chest-Supported Dumbbell Row
cues: Lie chest-down on an incline bench or propped bench, feet on the floor
Hold a dumbbell in each hand, arms extended toward the floor
Pull the dumbbells toward your lower ribs, keeping elbows close to your body
Squeeze your shoulder blades together at the top of the movement
Lower the dumbbells with control to the starting position
Keep your chest in contact with the bench at all times
Focus on squeezing your back muscles, not just moving the weight
variations: Use different bench angles for varied emphasis
